content.title: Parkes Weber Syndrome
content.description: Limb overgrowth with capillary malformation and underlying arteriovenous fistulas

key_concepts.details: Limb overgrowth, geographic capillary stain, multiple micro-AVFs
May be associated with RASA1 mutations (overlap with CM-AVM)
High-flow lesion with arteriovenous shunting causing warm extremity
High-output cardiac failure, leg length discrepancy, bleeding

content.clinical_significance: Distinguished from Klippel-Trenaunay by high-flow arteriovenous component

primary_sources: Boon LM et al. Hum Mol Genet 2005
